'''''Amon Hen'' 213''' is the two-hundred-and-thirteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[September]] [[2008]]

** By: [[Pauline Baynes]]

* Artwork: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference|Tolkien Centenary]] [[1892]]-[[1992]] design
